Data Fields
adc_attr_t Struct Reference
Analog to Digital Converter (ADC)

ADC IO Attributes. More...

#include <adc.h>

Collaboration diagram for adc_attr_t:

Detailed Description

This structure defines the attributes structure for configuring the ADC port.

Data Fields

uint8_t pin_assign
 The pin assignment to use (see LPC17xx Devices)
 
uint16_t enabled_channels
 A mask of the enabled channels (a one means the channel is enabled)
 
uint32_t freq
 The read update frequency (can't be zero). This is a target value when writing and the actual value when reading.
